Ever received an email with an attachment called Winmail.dat? This can be frustrating, especially when you cannot seem to figure out how to open it. Thankfully, Winmail Opener is here to save the day.

Winmail Opener is a free software that can be used to open and view winmail.dat files. In this guide, we will give you a comprehensive guide on how to use Winmail Opener to open and view your winmail.dat files.

## Installation

Before you can use Winmail Opener, you first need to install it on your computer. You can download it for free from reputable websites like Softonic and CNET. Once you have downloaded the software, you can proceed to install it by following the installation instructions.

## Using Winmail Opener

Once you have installed Winmail Opener, using it to open winmail.dat files is easy. Here is a step-by-step guide:

1. Locate the Winmail.dat file that you want to open on your computer.
2. Right-click on the file to reveal a drop-down menu.
3. Click on “Open with…” to reveal a list of programs to open the file with.
4. Choose Winmail Opener from the list of programs.
5. The attachment will then open in the Winmail Opener software.

Alternatively, you can simply drag and drop the Winmail.dat file into the Winmail Opener software.

## Benefits of Winmail Opener

There are several benefits of using Winmail Opener:

- It is a free software.
- It can be used to view winmail.dat attachments without the need for Microsoft Outlook.
- It is easy to use and requires no technical expertise.
- It supports multiple languages.

## Conclusion

In conclusion, Winmail Opener is a must-have software for anyone who frequently receives emails with winmail.dat attachments. It is a free and easy-to-use software that can be used to open and view these attachments without the need for Microsoft Outlook. Download it today and never struggle to open a winmail.dat attachment again.
